over the centuries many political
figures and others in positions of power
have found themselves on the receiving
end of assassination attempts some of
them have been successful and others not
so much but few figures in history have
been targeted more than a handful of
times and only one stands as the
undisputed assassination survivor
champion prior to his death in 2016
former president of Cuba Fidel Castro
was reportedly the target of over 600
assassination attempts many of which
were conducted by or with the approval
of the CIA and the most recent of which
occurred in 2000 from simple mob hits to
poison cigars Castro managed to escape
them all in this episode we'll take a
look at a few of the strangest ways the
world tried to kill Fidel Castro let's
start with the Looney Tunes classic the
old exploding cigar trick
Castro's love of fine cigars was well
known and the CIA decided that instead
of simply gunning him down they would
treat him to a cigar sure to knock him
dead exploding cigars used to be fairly
common gag gifts loaded with very small
amounts of explosives and used as a
prank on unsuspecting friends but there
have been a handful of instances
throughout history of very real and very
deadly explosive cigars used to try to
get rid of heads of state or other
notable targets the story goes that
during Castro's 1966 visit to the States
a CIA operative approached the New York
police chief with a plan to give Castro
the lethal cigar what happened next is
unclear but all we know is that Castro's
had never exploded while smoking a cigar
so odds are the plan failed somewhere
along the line besides his fondness for
fine tobacco products Castro also had a
soft spot for ice cream specifically
milkshakes the CIA figured out the name
of the Cuban leaders favorite ice cream
parlor and managed to find a cooperative
waiter at the establishment the plan was
simple
a mobster would visit the parlor and
hand off a poison pill which the waiter
would then put in Castro's milkshake the
handoff went smoothly enough but then
the waiter decided to put the pill in
the freezer for safekeeping until Castro
showed up when he finally came for a
shake the pill had frozen to the inside
of the freezer and the waiter broke it
trying to get it out with no plan B the
assassination attempt was aborted and
the waiter had to watch Castro enjoying
a perfectly harmless milkshake one
attempt that probably should have
worked was a plot by the CIA involving
Castro's ex-lover Marita Lorenz Lorentz
was supposed to get close to Castro and
smuggle a jar of poisoned face cream
into his room if he had ever applied the
cream that would have been the ballgame
unfortunately for the CIA
Castro somehow found out about the plot
the story goes that he offered Lorenz a
gun to shoot him but she didn't have the
nerve if I were a betting man I'd say a
more likely explanation is that she lost
her resolve and spilled the beans to
Castro and the gun story is just an
added embellishment regardless of how he
found out
Castro never applied the face cream and
avoided becoming a well most Erised
corpse having failed at the old
ex-girlfriend routine the CIA went back
to their wacky spy novel roots and
decided to lace Castro's scuba suit with
tubercle bacilli bacteria besides cigars
and milkshakes
the president loved to scuba dive so
naturally instead of training sharks
like any real assassin would do the CIA
opted for biological warfare it's
unclear whether this suit actually ever
made it into Castro's vicinity or
whether it was scrapped before it got
that far
if Castro had stepped into a suit
infested with tuberculosis bacteria odds
are he would have gotten seriously ill
but it wouldn't have been a guaranteed
death sentence so clearly trained sharks
would have been the better option here
before we look at our final
assassination attempt let's take a
moment for a couple of non-lethal
honorable mentions designed for
character assassination rather than the
real kind the first idea was to lace
Castro's boots with thallium salts which
would have caused all of his hair to
fall out destroying his famous beard and
altering the public's perception of
their leader the other honorable mention
is the absurd plot to pipe gaseous LSD
into the radio studio where Castro
broadcast speeches and announcements
with the goal of making him appear
unhinged or crazy thereby damaging his
public image neither of these plans came
to fruition but they're definitely still
up there with the weirder schemes to get
rid of a political target and finally
our last failed assassination attempt as
we saw earlier
Castro love to scuba dive again failing
to choose hit sharks the CIA decided
that the best course of action to kill
Castro in the water would be to plant an
exploding conch shell on the sea floor
and hope he picked it up imagine being
the team assigned that job picking the
prettiest shell and packing it full of
explosives in the hopes that the scuba
diving president of another con
would swim over and have a look needless
to say it didn't work
Castro would go on to say if surviving
assassination attempts were an Olympic
event I would win the gold medal
despite the more than 600 attempts on
his life Fidel Castro lived to the ripe
old age of 90 giving the CIA the finger
one more time by dying of old age while
